Impression and Plan
Impression
**AGE[in 50s] yo female admitted with decompensated heart failure secondary to NICM and noncompliance to medications .
Plan
1. Decompensated HF due to NICM .
EF 10-15% .
Sever TR and mod - sev MR .
Pt taking less Lasix than perscribed .
She has a h/o noncompliance .
She presented to the HF clinic with fluid overload and is admitted for diuresis .
Lasix 120 IV BID , Zaroxolyn , Aldactone and lisinopril .
She is has a h/o BB intolerance .
Monitor wts , I/O , fld restriction and low Na food plan .
2. BiVICD .
Guidant .
Implanted 7/06
3. Hypothyroidism .
TSH 19.734 .
Will check thyroid panel .
Cont Synthroid
4. DM .
Accuchecks and SSI .
Consider reconsulting J. **PLACE , inpt CDE .
Pt was newly diagnosed last adm .
Not on meds at home and hasn 't SMBG " in ages " .
Pt rec 'd a meter last admission .
Check A1C .
5. Severe Psoriasis .
Pt refuses intervention , " nothing works " .
6. Disp .
Diuresis , monitor renal function , eval thyroid func and BG .
Perform by **NAME[XXX , WWW M]
